Example: Crown closure is not measured in a clearcut
Tree species are not recorded in a clearcut

Description: Missing number that is not null
Example: Tree species does not occur and is recorded as 0

Description: Empty string that is not null
Example: Tree species does not occur and is recorded as empty string

Description: Value is outside the range of values
Value is not a member of a set or list
Example: Jurisdiction is not a member of allowable jurisdictions

Description: Value is of the wrong data type
Example: Crown closure is measured as a numeric instead of an integer

Description: Value is of the wrong data type
Example: Density is measured as an integer instead of a string
Stand height is recorded to 2 decimal places instead of 1

Description: Species code is not in a list
Example: Species code is malformed or does not exist in a list
